header.title: wxIconizeEvent

description.p: An event being sent when the frame is iconized (minimized) or restored.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxIconizeEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the frame has been iconized, false if it has been restored.

desc.p: Returns true if the frame has been iconized, false if it has been restored.
